Ontological Engineering
RDF(S) query languages
•
Languages developed to allow accessing datasets expressed in RDF(S) (and in some 
cases OWL)
•
Supported by the most important language APIs
–
Jena (HP labs)
–
Sesame (Aduna)
–
Boca (IBM)
–
KPOntology (iSOCO)
–
...
•
There are some differences wrt languages like SQL, such as
–
Combination of different sources
–
Trust management
–
Open World Assumption
